notes.title: How to use this API
notes.content: Use POST /notes to create, GET /notes to read, PUT to update, and DELETE to remove notes.

notes.title: Persistence Enabled
notes.content: Notes are stored in a local JSON file. Restarting the server will not erase them.

notes.title: Postman Test Note
notes.content: This note was created from Postman using POST /notes.
